Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
Every decoration here is all pink. Hee hee! It's so
cute.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
Yellow decorations make me feel all sweet and
warm.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
This place reminds me of a trip I took once to
the tropics. Best trip ever.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
What is it about all this country scenery that's
so...moving? Just looking at it makes me want
to go visit my hometown again.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
A tulip looks like a fairy coming out of a
flower...

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
Carnations remind me of my mother back in my
hometown.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
Wow, what beautiful red roses!

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
All these hibiscus flowers around here make me
think of a tropical paradise...

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
Aren't tulips beautiful? I love them.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
Oh, these are carnations, aren't they? I like the
color!

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
So many red roses here. They're gorgeous.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
Wow, I really feel like I'm off in a tropical
paradise.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
This is a cute decoration! It's so pretty.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
This looks like the gate to paradise. What a
beautiful arch.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
All these flowers make this place so beautiful.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
I bought some flowers. They'll look great in my
house.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
I found some very precious flowers. I'll have to
show them off.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
I came here on a rumor that this town had all
the flowers in the world. Now I want to come
here every day! ♪

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
I love flowers!

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
Wow, what a beautiful flower...

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
I wish there were more things to buy here...

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
This town is so close to nature. I should go take
a nice walk.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
I love the way the buildings all blend in with
nature here.

<NAME_MOB_ELLA>
I'm lucky to be here. This town's amazing!
